memberdef.name: MAP_FIXED
memberdef.initializer: 0x0010 /* map addr must be exactly as requested */

memberdef.name: MAP_NORESERVE
memberdef.initializer: 0x0040 /* Sun: don't reserve needed swap area */

memberdef.name: MAP_NOSYNC
memberdef.initializer: 0x0800 /* page to but do not sync underlying file */

memberdef.name: MAP_RENAME
memberdef.initializer: 0x0020 /* Sun: rename private pages to file */

memberdef.name: MAP_STACK
memberdef.initializer: 0x0400 /* region grows down, like a stack */

memberdef.name: NBBY
memberdef.initializer: 8 /* number of bits in a byte */
